title: These workers take ‘hush trips.’ Here’s how they’re hiding them from the boss
description: Nearly one in 10 workers took a "hush trip" in the past year. CNBC Travel spoke to several about where they went and how they mask their whereabouts.

title: The 7 U.S. cities where a $250,000 salary is worth the least — New York is No. 1
description: Looking to make the most out of your money? Be wary of these seven cities where $250,000 has the least purchasing power.

title: Spotify exec calls Harry and Meghan ‘grifters’ after podcast deal comes to early end
description: Spotify executive Bill Simmons described Prince Harry and Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, as "grifters" after a deal between the parties ended Friday.

title: Brits are facing a major mortgage crisis as lending rates soar
description: The average two-year fixed rate rose above 6% on Monday as experts warned of chaos in a market with fewer available products.

title: Blinken to meet China's Xi Jinping on Monday, U.S. official says
description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken is to meet with Chinese President Xi Jinping on Monday, as the top U.S. diplomat wraps up his rare two-day visit to Beijing amid simmering U.S.-China tensions.

title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway ups stakes in five Japanese trading firms
description: Berkshire Hathaway's stake in each of the trading firms now averages more than 8.5%.

title: Rate cuts, hikes and pauses: The world's central banks just made very different decisions
description: Major central banks are taking very different approaches to monetary policy, as the global economy "is no longer synchronized," an expert said.

title: A.I. could ‘remove all human touchpoints’ in supply chains. Here’s what that means
description: Artificial intelligence may "totally (or nearly) remove all human touchpoints in the supply chain including 'back office' tasks," Morgan Stanley says.

title: Hong Kong's new dual counter scheme 'solidifies' city's role as yuan trading hub, HKEX CEO says
description: Investors in Hong Kong will soon be able to trade selected Hong Kong stocks in both the Hong Kong dollar and Chinese yuan in the so-called dual counter scheme.

title: Singapore is not looking to regulate A.I. just yet, says the city-state's authority
description: The Singapore government is making efforts to promote the responsible use of AI.

title: Goldman joins Wall Street banks in cutting China's growth outlook as post-Covid bounce fades
description: Goldman Sachs sees further turbulence ahead for the Chinese economy as the recovery from its stringent Covid measures continue to disappoint.

title: Water wars: Afghanistan and Iran's deadly border flare-up spotlights scarcity crisis
description: Grappling with sanctions and severely weakened economies, both countries are already under significant pressure.

title: France makes high-profile push to be the A.I. hub of Europe setting up challenge to U.S., China
description: France is making a major push to position itself as Europe's hub for artificial intelligence, throwing its weight behind the fast-growing and much-hyped technology.
